QuestData.Title: The Ultrasonic Screwdriver
QuestData.Description: The unit you just dismantled had this inside of its mechanical innards.$B$BIt looks pretty complicated... certainly someone back at the airstrip would want to take a look at it. Maybe Crafty Wobblesprocket?
QuestData.LogDescription: Deliver the Ultrasonic Screwdriver to Crafty Wobblesprocket at Fizzcrank Airstrip.
QuestData.RewardText: My screwdriver... you found my screwdriver! I'd been wondering where that thing got lost.$B$BHmm, you found it inside one of their robots, you say? That gives me an idea....
